definition: Hong'an county in Huanggang 黃岡|黄冈[Huang2 gang1], Hubei
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.english: The subject that this text studies is this case of Yongjiahe town of Hongan County of Hubei.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究的主體是湖北省紅安縣永佳河鎮這一個案。
